targets.expr:
label_replace(
(
 sum by (instance)
  (namedprocess_namegroup_states{instance=~".*:3004", job="cube-process-exporter", matches="map[:cloudstack-agent]"})
),
 "pingip",
 "$1",
 "instance",
 "(.*):.*"
)
/ on (pingip) group_left() probe_success{pingip=~".*", job="cube-blackbox"}

label_replace(
(
 sum by (instance)
  (namedprocess_namegroup_states{instance=~".*:3004", job="cube-process-exporter", matches="map[:libvirtd]"})
),
 "pingip",
 "$1",
 "instance",
 "(.*):.*"
)
/ on (pingip) group_left() probe_success{pingip=~".*", job="cube-blackbox"}

(

 "(.*):.*"

/ on (pingip) group_left() probe_success{pingip=~".*", job="cube-blackbox"}
